dc:title: The Listener
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Notes labor unrest and growing awareness of inequalities in the social system. Lauds doing what one can, quoting saints.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 884 1933-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
